Welcome to HxUI

HxUI is Helix Experience UI library for creating websites and Apps

HxUI includes the resources to create user interfaces consistent with the Helix design principles, design language, and best practices. Rather than focusing on pixels, developers can focus on application logic, while designers can focus on user experience, interactions, and flows.

Developers

Familiarize yourself with the following:

  1. Get an overview of our Markup and Style guidelines including the class naming conventions used in our CSS.
  2. Review the Components; each component provides semantically correct and accessible markup and documentation.

Designers

Start with the following:

  1. Explore the documentation to learn the HxUI design patterns and principles.
  2. Review the Components section, to familiarize yourself with the existing components which you can incorporate into your designs.
